Class ModRPCs.SerializableOptions

Namespace
ModLib.Meadow

A serializable wrapper around a ServerOptions' local options dictionary.

Creates a new ModRPCs.SerializableOptions instance with the provided options for serialization.

public SerializableOptions(IDictionary<string, ConfigValue> options)

Parameters

options IDictionary<string, ConfigValue>

The options dictionary for serialization.

Remarks

Options prefixed with an underscore (_) are ignored for serialization purposes.

The internally held option values;
